description: This delicious and warming soup is packed with flavour. It's budget friendly and you can have it on the table in 30 minutes.
name: Moroccan-Style Spiced Lentil Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a stick blender, blitz soup until smooth. Ladle soup into bowls. Serve topped with yoghurt and coriander. Serve seasoned with pepper.
